text: the circuit board printer kickstarter ends in less than 48 hours. If there's $1500 laying around I suggest we pick one up! <https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/voltera/voltera-your-circuit-board-prototyping-machine?ref=48hr>

attachments.title: Voltera:  Your Circuit Board Prototyping Machine
attachments.text: Print your circuit boards, dispense solder paste, and reflow! The Voltera V-One lets you go from concept to creation in minutes.
attachments.fallback: Kickstarter: Voltera:  Your Circuit Board Prototyping Machine

text: hold on, digging between the couch cushions
